# 装饰模式
类型：结构型设计模式

定义：动态的将新功能附加到对象上。在对象功能扩展方面，它比继承更有弹性。

## 类图


![avatar][Image0]

## 概念代码
```c++
class Componet
{
public:
	virtual void operate() = 0;
};

class ConcreteComponent : public Componet
{
public:
	virtual void operate()
	{

	}
};

class Decorate : public Componet
{
public:
	Decorate(Componet comp)
	{
		m_comp = comp
	}
	virtual void operate()
	{
		m_comp.operate()
	}
private:
	Componet m_comp;
}

class ConcreteDecorateA : public Decorate
{
public:
	ConcreteDecorateA(Componet comp)
	:Decorate(comp)
	{
	}

	void method1()
	{
		//定义自己的修饰方法
	}

	virtual void operate()
	{
		Decorate::operate();
		method1();
	}
}

class ConcreteDecorateB : public Decorate
{
public:
	ConcreteDecorateB(Componet comp)
	:Decorate(comp)
	{
	}

	void method1()
	{
		//定义自己的修饰方法
	}

	virtual void operate()
	{
		Decorate::operate();
		method1();
	}
}

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	Componet* p = new ConcreteComponent();
	p = new ConcreteDecorateA(p);
	p = new ConcreteDecorateB(p);
}
```
